import{dispatchHelper}from'../utils/utils';import{GET_USER_POSTS,GET_BOOKMARKED_POSTS,GET_TAGGED_POSTS,GET_SHARED_POSTS,GET_PHOTOS,GET_FEED,GET_GROUP_POSTS,GET_GROUP_PHOTOS,GET_POST,GET_POST_LIKES,REMOVE_LIKE,GET_POST_TAGS,GET_USERS_TO_SHARE,GET_POST_SHARERS,ADD_USER_POST,ADD_GROUP_POST,EDIT_POST,DELETE_POST,UNTAG,UNBOOKMARK,REMOVE_SHARE,COMMENT,DELETE_COMMENT,EDIT_COMMENT,CHANGE_POSTIT_PROPERTIES,RESET_POSTIT}from'./types';export var getUserPosts=function getUserPosts(username){return dispatchHelper(GET_USER_POSTS,'get-user-posts',{username:username});};export var getBookmarkedPosts=function getBookmarkedPosts(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_BOOKMARKED_POSTS,'get-bookmarked-posts',{user:user});};export var getTaggedPosts=function getTaggedPosts(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_TAGGED_POSTS,'get-tagged-posts',{user:user});};export var getSharedPosts=function getSharedPosts(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_SHARED_POSTS,'get-shared-posts',{user:user});};export var getPhotos=function getPhotos(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_PHOTOS,'get-photos',{user:user});};export var getFeed=function getFeed(){return dispatchHelper(GET_FEED,'get-feed');};export var getGroupPosts=function getGroupPosts(group){return dispatchHelper(GET_GROUP_POSTS,'get-group-posts',{group:group});};export var getGroupPhotos=function getGroupPhotos(group){return dispatchHelper(GET_GROUP_PHOTOS,'get-group-photos',{group:group});};export var getPost=function getPost(post_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_POST,'get-post',{post_id:post_id});};export var getPostLikes=function getPostLikes(post){return dispatchHelper(GET_POST_LIKES,'get-post-likes',{post:post});};export var removeLike=function removeLike(like_id){return dispatchHelper(REMOVE_LIKE,'remove-like',{like_id:like_id});};export var getPostTags=function getPostTags(post){return dispatchHelper(GET_POST_TAGS,'get-post-tags',{post:post});};export var getUsersToShare=function getUsersToShare(post){return dispatchHelper(GET_USERS_TO_SHARE,'get-users-to-share',{post:post});};export var getPostSharers=function getPostSharers(post){return dispatchHelper(GET_POST_SHARERS,'get-post-sharers',{post:post});};export var addUserPost=function addUserPost(post){return{type:ADD_USER_POST,payload:post};};export var addGroupPost=function addGroupPost(post){return{type:ADD_GROUP_POST,payload:post};};export var editPost=function editPost(post_details){return{type:EDIT_POST,payload:post_details};};export var deletePost=function deletePost(post){return{type:DELETE_POST,payload:post};};export var untag=function untag(user){return{type:UNTAG,payload:user};};export var unbookmark=function unbookmark(post){return{type:UNBOOKMARK,payload:post};};export var removeShare=function removeShare(share_id){return{type:REMOVE_SHARE,payload:share_id};};export var comment=function comment(_comment){return{type:COMMENT,payload:_comment};};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(comment_id){return{type:DELETE_COMMENT,payload:comment_id};};export var editComment=function editComment(comment){return{type:EDIT_COMMENT,payload:comment};};export var changePostitProperties=function changePostitProperties(what,values){return{type:CHANGE_POSTIT_PROPERTIES,payload:{what:what,values:values}};};export var resetPostIt=function resetPostIt(){return{type:RESET_POSTIT};};
